item.description:
This non-sectarian chapter, which is part of our Social Action Project, is focused on the mindful recovery from all sorts of craving and addiction such as alcohol, drugs, gambling, eating, relationships, porn and nicotine. It integrates the traditional 12 steps with the Noble Eightfold Path and Pure Land teachings. Meetings include inspirational Buddhist scriptural readings, silent meditation, mindfulness, prayer and plenty of discussion. Gathers most Mondays at 7 p.m. in Middletown.

Open to all regardless of religious affiliation.
